# Emoji Vendors Images

This directory contains logo images for various emoji vendors/platforms.

## Image Requirements

- Size: 60x60 pixels
- Format: PNG with transparent background preferred
- Naming: Use lowercase, hyphen-separated names (e.g., `google.png`, `apple.png`)

## List of Vendors

1. Google
2. Apple
3. Microsoft
4. Facebook
5. Twitter
6. Whatsapp
7. TikTok
8. Mozilla
9. JoyPixels (Animation)
10. JoyPixels
11. EmojiOne
12. EmojiTwo
13. OpenMoji
14. EmojiDex
15. BlobMoji
16. Samsung
17. HTC
18. LG
19. Docomo
20. Softbank
21. Au Kddi
22. Skype (Animation)
23. Symbola
24. Telegram (Animation)
25. Emojipedia
26. Sample
27. QQ
28. Wechat
29. Weibo
30. Baidu
31. Douyin
32. Bilibili
33. Huawei
34. Microsoft Teams
35. Emojiall

## Notes

- All images should be properly licensed or created for use in this project
- Placeholder images can be used during development
- Each image should have appropriate alt text for accessibility
